Gold Eagle Enterprises Ltd
values.description:
Gold Eagle Consulting Brighton is one of the only Companies in Sussex to offer JobSearch Support in addition to our professional CV writing services. We also provide Recruitment Solutions to a range of businesses stretching from Eastbourne to Hove, Worthing and Crawley.

Gold Eagle Consulting offers extensive support to customers in their job search so it is our mission to make you stand out from the crowd by writing a CV or Resume that will not only market you more effectively but will make a professional first impression.

Our mission at Gold Eagle Consulting is to give every candidate the best possible chance of being recognised for their skills and achievements at every stage of the process. Whether you need help with covering letters, a professionally written CV, refocused Job Search support or with interview techniques then we are here to help.

We are passionate at helping employers retain staff either through effective training or through the recruitment supply chain. Our consultancy services will drive through improved efficiencies within your recruitment processes and recruitment procedures which will result in direct and indirect cost savings.

values.name: Vertigo Films
values.description:
Vertigo Films is a UK Media company founded in 2002 to create and distribute commercially driven independent cinema.

rom their first film - Nick Love's The Football Factory (the biggest selling independent UK DVD with 1.3M units to date) through such genre films as The Business, Shrooms and The Children to multi award winning films such as Its All Gone Pete Tong, London to Brighton, In Search of A Midnight Kiss and Bronson, Vertigo has used innovative new technology, meticulous attention to budget and great care of its audience to produce and distribute thirty films to date with an unprecedented string of commercial success.

In 2009 Vertigo have released the critically acclaimed The Firm (Nick Love) and Bronson (Nicholas Widing Refn), One Day (the UK's first hip hop musical), The Cove (2009 Sundance Audience Award Winner) and Humpday (2009 Sundance Special Jury Prize Winner).

2010 has been a sensational year for Vertigo with Europe's first 3D live action movie, Streetdance 3D, entering the UK Box Office charts at No.1 beating Disney's Prince of Persia and becoming one of the most successful UK independent films of all time as it opened around the world. Vertigo's AJAMI was nominated for Best Foreign Film and THE COVE won the Oscar for Best Documentary Feature. Around the world from October will see the release of the much anticipated sci-fi film MONSTERS which has been getting exceptional buzz and acclaim on the festival circuit and finding such fans as Peter Jackson and Quentin Tarantino.

In addition to its production and distribution activity, Vertigo also owns The Post Republic, a state of the art post production company based in Berlin and is a partner in Protagonist Pictures, the international sales company joint venture with Film Four and Ingenious Media. Earlier this year, with LA based 3D experts Paradise FX, Vertigo set up PFXE, Europe's most experience 3D facilities company.

values.name: I Work Safe
values.description:
Health & Safety Equipment Specialists 

We specialise in selling health and safety products and equipment in the UK. We have over 23,000 products online that make your job safer. 

Stay compliant with the law and keep you and your workers safe. 

If you're not sure what you need you can use our online chat box to speak to a sales operative. 

We recommend you read keep up to date with legislation by reading the HSE website.

Safety Equipment For All 

Many of our products can also make your home life safer. Many needles accidents happen in the home. 

We often supply first aid kits, step ladders, dust masks, cleaning equipment and more to home users. So if you want to work safe or stay safe at home – we can help!

Washington County is located in Southeast Iowa and covers 556.75 square miles in the richest of America's agricultural region. The population of the county was 21,704 people according to the 2010 census. The nine incorporated cities in the county are Ainsworth, Brighton, Coppock, Crawfordsville, Kalona, Riverside, Washington, Wellman, and West Chester.

Washington City is the county seat of Washington County and county business has been conducted at the courthouse, 222 West Main Street, since 1887.
values.name: Washington County, Iowa

Dixon Hurst Kemp

values: Alterations to buildings and residential dwellings

values.description:
We are Consulting Civil and Structural Engineers. We work with people designing and altering buildings to develop appropriate economic structural solutions, stability and specification of details. We specialise in quality, cost effective engineering on every project and we are proud of our reputation for providing fast, responsive and reliable service on large and small projects.

We are committed to partnering and forming long term relationships with our Clients. Repeat appointments are highly valued and we like to think that our Clients needs are fulfilled in a pro-active, innovative but sound manner. We do however temper innovation with practical experience.

It is part of our overall promise of quality to keep up to date with current developments within the structural and civil engineering industry. In doing so, we make certain that our Clients benefit from the technical advances in the field. We also ensure that our technical staff are supported by up to date computer and information technology facilities

We have offices in Chichester, Horsham and Brighton.

values.name: The Packman
values.description: I am a dog trainer to Brighton and have been working with dogs for most of my life. My father and uncle work with dogs,it's a family thing.  I use a kind and gentle approch to training, praise and reward will get you a lot further than rollled up newspapers ever will. Some dogs change overnight and some take a few weeks but all get there in the end. I will even walk your dog combining a dog trainer and walker in one.

values.name: Association Orane
values.description:
Créé en 1999, Marsatac est aujourd’hui le plus important festival de musiques actuelles à Marseille et dans toute la région PACA. Sa notoriété nationale le positionne comme l'un des festivals leader sur les musiques électro en France et en Europe.

Il se déroule en trois soirées (du 23 au 25 septembre 2010) et attire un public fidèle en quête de nouveautés musicales.

Marsatac a vu son nombre de spectateurs augmenter de manière exceptionnelle passant de 2 000 en 1999 à 30 000 attendus pour cette année.
L’association Orane, porteuse du projet Marsatac, est également à l’initiative de la programmation et co-production de plusieurs opérations à Marseille et dans la Région PACA. L’association développe parallèlement une série d’échanges internationaux (Glasgow, Brighton, Manchester...), des créations (Bamako, Beyrouth) ainsi que de nombreuses collaborations avec les acteurs de la scène des musiques actuelles (salles, collectifs etc...).

Le 26 et 27 février 2010, Marsatac a lancé sa première session d'hiver à l’Espace Julien, la salle qui l’a vu débuter.

The ultimate circus entertainment experience. 	 

We are Entertainers based in the heart of Brighton, we specialise in children's parties and events.

Our aim is to entertain and perform leaving you with a show to remember, we offer a range of activities and games for our children's parties, as well as amazing tricks in our fire shows including fire eating and breathing, (where suitably safe).

We can create 20ft human Cathrine wheels, Rings of fire and customised flame images for that spectacular effect, We will get you noticed.

We also have glow shows that will leave you amazed and comedy acts that will make you laugh no matter what age you are.

We have a range of staff, a bigger range of toys and a even bigger range of ideas, we have what you want!

We customise all our shows to be as interactive as desired.

Fun for ALL
We have a no exclusion policy, believing everyone should have a go in some way, we will take the skills they have and improve and master them.
There is nothing that cannot be achieved with simple patience and understanding, our job is to make that leaning path as fun as possible It is the supreme art of our teachers to awaken joy in creative expression and knowledge.

values.name: FEX INTERNATIONAL

values.description:
We service our clients with everything they need to get fashion online and in-store. Talk to us about any part of the fashion supply chain and let FDS be your helping hands. With years of industry experience, clients use our services in a myriad of ways; from brand strategy and creative direction, design and sample development, product sourcing and manufacture - right the way through to delivery in-store.  It's time to take fashion further.

We're a privately owned fashion design, sourcing and manufacturing company. With years of industry experience, FDS specialises in the whole fashion supply chain process,  including product sourcing and manufacture, strategic direction, creative direction and garment development, all backed up with years of industry experience. We help start-up retailers & brands make their visions into reality, and design and manufacture fashion for household names. Our head office is based in Shoreham-by-Sea, a stone's throw from Brighton, and with our merchandise & QC satellite office in Istanbul, Turkey, we're able to service fashion clients on an international scale.

address.street1: The Ropetackle Building, Adur Business Centre,

values: From a helping hand to a complete solution

values.name: Fashion Design Solutions Ltd.
Go Ahead Events
values.description:
What we do:
TOAST Festivals
Toast Festival is the northern hemisphere's largest celebration of South African, New Zealand and Australian food, wine, polo, live music and culture. It takes place in London over three days and 2010 celebrates the 10th anniversary of this iconic event. www.toastfestivals.com

HOVE CHAMPAGNE FESTIVAL
A sensational day out discovering and learning more about champagne with a showcase of over 50 champagnes and sparkling wines to try from some of the best champagne houses and suppliers in the world. This festival takes place on the beautiful hove seafront with the English Channel as the backdrop. The day out is complimented by delicious food and fine entertainment. www.hovechampagnefestival.com

BRIGHTON WINE AND POLO FESTIVAL
Launching in 2011 is a fantastic extravaganza of over 100 wines from around the world to try by the glass along with fine and fabulous food to taste and take home. A wonderful setting to enjoy an action packed polo match, one of Britain's most dynamic sports. www.brightonwineandpolo.com
